_header: He bore him up he bore him down
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 530.
Subjects: carols, of the Eucharist; Corpus Christi
_description: A Corpus Christi carol — six couplets and burden: ‘Lulley lulley lulley lulley / The fawcon hath born my mak away’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
He bare hym vp he bare hym downHe bare hym in to an orchard
                    brown…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& by þat beddis side þer stondith a
                        stonCorpus Christi wretyn þer onExplicit
